brands.name: ARIVO
brands.description: Arivo is a new and growing tire brand that has become popular in the Philippines for offering affordable yet reliable tires. The brand provides a wide range of options for passenger cars, SUVs, and light trucks, giving Filipino drivers more choices for different road needs. Arivo tires are known for their good grip, stable handling, and comfortable rides, while still being budget-friendly. Many drivers choose Arivo because it balances quality, safety, and value, making it a practical choice for everyday city driving, highway travel, and even light off-road use.

brands.name: Comforser
brands.description: Comforser is a Chinese tire brand that has gained popularity in the Philippines for offering affordable and durable tires. It produces a wide range of tires for passenger cars, SUVs, pickups, and off-road vehicles. Known for their strong tread designs and dependable performance, Comforser tires are a good choice for drivers who need reliability without spending too much. Many Filipino drivers choose Comforser for its balance of comfort, safety, and toughness, especially for both city driving and rougher provincial roads.

brands.name: Giti
brands.description: Giti is a global tire brand from Singapore that is trusted in the Philippines for its quality, safety, and value. It offers a wide range of tires for cars, SUVs, and trucks, designed to handle both city roads and long-distance travel. Filipino drivers choose Giti because of its good grip in wet and dry conditions, fuel efficiency, and reliable durability. The brand is also recognized worldwide as an original equipment (OE) tire supplier for several car manufacturers, proving its strong reputation for performance and safety.

brands.name: MONSTA
brands.description: Monsta is an Australian tire brand known for its rugged design, off-road strength, and stylish looks. In the Philippines, it is popular among SUV and 4x4 owners who want tires that can handle both city roads and tough terrains. Monsta tires stand out because of their aggressive tread patterns, strong durability, and sidewall designs that also add a sporty appearance to vehicles.

brands.name: DUNLOP
brands.description: Dunlop is a well-known Japanese tire brand trusted by many drivers in the Philippines for its quality, durability, and performance. The brand is popular because it offers tires that fit a wide range of vehicles, from small passenger cars to SUVs and high-performance models. Many car manufacturers also choose Dunlop as original equipment (OE), proving its reputation for safety and reliability. Filipino drivers value Dunlop for its ability to deliver good grip on wet and dry roads, comfortable rides, fuel efficiency, and long tread life. Whether for everyday city driving or long highway trips, Dunlop has a tire designed to meet the needs of local roads.

brands.name: FALKEN
brands.description: Falken is a Japanese tire brand known for its performance, durability, and comfort. In the Philippines, it is trusted by drivers who want reliable tires for both city roads and long highway drives. Falken offers a range of products, from everyday passenger tires to high-performance and SUV tires, making it a flexible choice for Filipino drivers. Many appreciate Falken for its good grip in wet and dry conditions, quiet rides, and strong tread life, giving a balance of safety and performance.

brands.name: MICHELIN
brands.description: Michelin is a world-leading tire brand from France, trusted in the Philippines for its premium quality, safety, and long-lasting performance. Many Filipino drivers prefer Michelin because it offers excellent grip in all weather, fuel efficiency, and comfortable rides. The brand is also chosen as original equipment (OE) by top car manufacturers, proving its reputation for innovation and reliability. Whether for city driving, long highway trips, or SUVs on tougher roads, Michelin tires deliver performance that meets the needs of local drivers.

brands.name: RADAR TYRES
brands.description: Radar Tyres is a global tire brand from Singapore, known for offering affordable, reliable, and stylish tires. In the Philippines, it has become popular with drivers looking for value and performance across cars, SUVs, and 4x4s. Radar stands out for its wide range of designs, dependable grip, and durable tread life, making it a practical choice for both daily driving and off-road adventures.

brands.name: raiden
brands.description: Raiden is a tire brand designed for SUVs, pickups, and off-road vehicles, known in the Philippines for its rugged durability and aggressive styling. Popular among 4x4 and adventure drivers, Raiden tires are built to handle city roads, highways, and challenging terrains while still providing comfort and stability. With bold sidewall designs and strong tread patterns, Raiden is also favored for adding a sporty, tough look to vehicles.

brands.name: ROADCRUZA
brands.description: Roadcruza is a Chinese tire brand that has been gaining attention in the Philippines for its affordable pricing, stylish designs, and dependable performance. It produces a wide range of tires for cars, SUVs, pickups, and 4x4s, making it a flexible choice for Filipino drivers. Known for aggressive tread patterns, good grip, and durability, Roadcruza is especially popular among those who want rugged-looking tires for city and adventure driving.

brands.name: ROADX
brands.description: RoadX is a modern tire brand known for offering affordable yet dependable tires for different types of vehicles. In the Philippines, it is chosen by drivers who want value, safety, and versatility without a high price tag. RoadX produces tires for cars, SUVs, and light trucks, delivering good traction, comfort, and durability for both city and highway use.

brands.name: SAILUN
brands.description: Sailun is a Chinese tire brand that has built a strong reputation worldwide, including in the Philippines, for its affordable pricing and dependable quality. It offers a wide range of tires for cars, SUVs, and light trucks, making it a practical choice for Filipino drivers. Sailun tires are valued for their good performance on wet and dry roads, durability, and comfort, giving drivers a balance of safety and budget-friendly reliability.

brands.name: SUMAXX
brands.description: Sumaxx is a budget-friendly tire brand that offers options for cars, SUVs, pickups, and 4x4s. In the Philippines, it is chosen by drivers who want affordable yet dependable tires for both city driving and outdoor adventures. Summax tires are known for their rugged tread designs, reliable grip, and versatile performance, making them a practical choice for everyday use and light off-road driving.

brands.name: TOYO TIRES
brands.description: Toyo Tires is a Japanese tire brand well-known in the Philippines for its durability, performance, and stylish designs, especially for SUVs, pickups, and 4x4s. Filipino drivers trust Toyo for its strong off-road capability, long tread life, and stable highway comfort. The brand is also popular for its Open Country series, which combines toughness and reliability for both city driving and outdoor adventures.

brands.name: YOKOHAMA
brands.description: Yokohama is a Japanese tire brand trusted in the Philippines for its high quality, safety, and performance. Known for both everyday driving and motorsports, Yokohama offers tires for cars, SUVs, and trucks that balance grip, comfort, and durability. Filipino drivers value Yokohama for its advanced technology, fuel efficiency, and reliable traction, whether on city roads, highways, or off-road trails.

products.name: ADVAN Sport V107
products.description: The Yokohama Advan Sport V107 is a premium high-performance tire made for luxury and sports cars. It combines comfort, stability, and strong wet/dry performance, giving a refined and confident drive.

It has a modern tread design that gives good grip on both wet and dry roads, helping reduce the risk of slipping. The tire is also built to be quiet and smooth, so rides feel more comfortable. With its durable rubber compound, the Premio ARZ-1 lasts longer and provides great value for money, making it a reliable choice for budget-conscious drivers.

tipsGuides.title: Tire Treadwear Rating: Why It Matters for Drivers in the Philippines
tipsGuides.content:
When buying new tires, most people focus on the brand or price alone. But one crucial factor often overlooked is the treadwear rating. In a country like the Philippines—where weather can be unpredictable and road conditions vary widely—understanding this number can help you save money and drive more safely.

What is a Treadwear Rating?

The treadwear rating is part of the Uniform Tire Quality Grading (UTQG) system, found on the tire's sidewall along with the traction and temperature grades. It’s a number (e.g., 300, 400, 600) that indicates how long a tire is expected to last compared to a standard "reference tire."

  • For example, a tire with a treadwear rating of 400 is expected to last 4 times longer than a reference tire rated at 100.

Note: This isn’t a direct measure of kilometers—it’s more of a relative comparison under standardized test conditions.

Why is This Important in the Philippines?

  1. Hot Climate - The Philippine heat affects how fast tires wear out. Hot roads, especially on highways, can cause the rubber to break down faster. Tires with higher treadwear ratings generally last longer under these conditions.

  1. Mixed Road Conditions - From smooth expressways like NLEX and SLEX to rough provincial and barangay roads, Filipino drivers face all kinds of surfaces. For those who are always doing long drives, you definitely need to check higher treadwear rating tires. A tire with a stronger, longer-lasting tread can better withstand daily wear and tear.

  2. Rainy Season and Floods - When the rains come, proper tread depth is crucial to avoid hydroplaning. Worn-out tires become dangerous on wet roads. A tire that wears slowly is safer during the long rainy season.

  3. Cost-Efficiency - Tires with higher treadwear ratings don’t wear out as quickly—meaning you won't need to replace them as often. With the rising cost of goods, extending the life of your tires can make a big difference in your budget.

How to Choose Tires Based on Treadwear Rating

  • Mostly City Driving? – A treadwear rating of 300–400 is usually sufficient.

  • Long Drives or Provincial Roads? – Go for 500 and above for better durability.

  • Commercial Use (Grab, delivery, etc.)? – Look for high treadwear ratings (600+) to get the most value.

One Important Note: Higher Isn’t Always Better

Tires with very high treadwear ratings often use a harder rubber compound. While they last longer, they may provide less grip—especially on wet roads or sharp corners. That’s why you should also consider the traction and temperature ratings to find the right balance between durability and safety.

 

 

Final Thoughts

In the Philippines—where we deal with everything from blazing sun to sudden floods, and from smooth highways to rough backroads—choosing the right tire isn't just about performance. It's about safety, savings, and peace of mind.

So next time you’re tire shopping, don’t just look at the brand or the price. Check the treadwear rating and make sure it fits your driving needs.

For all your tire needs, i-Tire2Go mo na ‘yan!

faqs.question: What is Tire2Go?
faqs.answer:
Tire2Go is the evolution of 202 Mags and Tires, a business built from a passion for cars and a commitment to providing quality wheels and tires. What began three years ago as a small online marketplace post quickly gained the trust of customers through reliable products, affordable prices, and excellent service.

From those humble beginnings, Tire2Go grew from online selling to opening a physical store, serving more car owners with the same dedication and personal touch. Today, Tire2Go continues to be a trusted name in the community, driven by the belief that every car owner deserves access to dependable, affordable, and stylish wheels and tires.

faqs.question: What is our mission?
faqs.answer: Our mission at Tire2Go is to empower every car owner with access to dependable, high-quality, and stylish wheels and tires at prices that remain within reach. We are committed not only to providing products that ensure safety and performance but also to creating a customer experience built on trust, care, and expertise.

faqs.question: What is our vision?
faqs.answer: Our vision is to establish Tire2Go as the leading tire and wheel provider in the Philippines, recognized for our unwavering dedication to quality, value, and customer satisfaction. We aspire to expand beyond being just a store, evolving into a trusted partner for every driver—from daily commuters to car enthusiasts.

faqs.question: What is our core values?
faqs.answer:
• Quality First - We deliver only wheels and tires we would trust for our own vehicles, ensuring safety and durability on every ride.

  • Customer-Centered - Every decision starts with the needs of our customers. We listen, guide, and provide solutions that truly fit.

  • Integrity - We believe in honesty, transparency, and fair pricing—building trust through every interaction and transaction.

  • Passion For Cars - Our love for cars drives us to continuously improve, innovate, and share our expertise with every car owner.

  • Community Trust - We grow alongside our community by creating strong relationships built on respect, reliability, and service.

faqs.question: How do I shop for tires in Tire2Go?
faqs.answer:
1. Search for your tires - Using your tire size or vehicle make model you can search for tires from our wide range of legitimate sellers. If we have your size on stock, we will show you a list of best priced options. Select a tire like.

  2. Select your location & installation site – Tire prices may vary per location and we will present different locations where you can have your tires professionally installed or delivered.

  3. Check out and pay online securely – We will secure this information and use this to contact you about your order and verify your identity at the installation center.

  4. Get your tires professionally installed – Arrive at the installation center 10 mins before your designated time, avoid the queue and have your tires installed all while experience a 5 start customer service. You also must settle the balance, if any. An official invoice will be issued to you.

faqs.question: How do I check my tire size?
faqs.answer: At the front side wall of the tire you should see the size broken down as per the diagram below. You can use this to search for your tires.

policies.content:
[Your App Name] ("we," "our," or "us") values your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your information when you use our e-commerce application for tires and mags. By accessing or using our app, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy.

1. Information We Collect

We may collect the following types of information:

  • Personal Information: Name, email address, phone number, billing and shipping address, and payment details.

  • Account Information: Login credentials, order history, saved vehicles, and preferences.

  • Device Information: IP address, browser type, operating system, and app usage data.

  • Location Information: If enabled, approximate location to recommend nearby stores or services.

  • Transaction Information: Details of purchases, payment method, invoices, and receipts.

2. How We Use Your Information

We use the collected information to:

  • Process and deliver your orders.

  • Provide customer support and respond to inquiries.

  • Personalize your shopping experience (e.g., showing compatible tires/mags).

  • Improve our app performance, security, and features.

  • Send updates, promotions, and important notices (you can opt-out anytime).

  • Comply with legal obligations and prevent fraudulent activities.

3. Sharing of Information

We do not sell your personal data. However, we may share information with:

  • Service Providers: Payment gateways, delivery couriers, IT support, and marketing tools.

  • Legal Authorities: When required by law or to protect our rights, property, and users.

  • Business Transfers: In case of mergers, acquisitions, or restructuring.

4. Data Security

We implement reasonable technical and organizational measures to safeguard your information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no electronic storage or transmission method is 100% secure.

5. Cookies and Tracking

Our app may use cookies and similar technologies to improve user experience, track usage, and deliver personalized recommendations. You may disable cookies in your device or browser settings, but some features may not function properly.

6. Your Rights

Depending on your location, you may have rights to:

  • Access, update, or delete your personal data.

  • Withdraw consent for data processing.

  • Opt-out of marketing communications.

  • Request a copy of your stored data.

7. Third-Party Links

Our app may contain links to third-party websites or services. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these external sites.

8. Children’s Privacy

Our app is not intended for individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect data from minors.

9. Updates to This Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Changes will be posted within the app with the updated effective date.

10. Contact Us

For questions or concerns regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

[Your Business Name]
Email: [Your Support Email]
Phone: [Your Business Phone]

Date Updated: Sept. 18, 2025

can you tell me more about your business?

Of course! I'd be happy to share more about us.

Welcome to **Tire2Go**! We're more than just a tire shop; we're a business built from a genuine **passion for cars**. Our mission is to be your trusted partner in keeping your vehicle safe, stylish, and performing at its best.

Here’s a little more about what we stand for:

### Our Core Values
*   **Quality & Affordability:** We believe everyone deserves safe and reliable tires without breaking the bank. We source high-quality tires and mags and offer them at competitive prices. We even have great promos, like our popular ***Buy 3 tires, Get 1 Free*** deal on select items!
*   **Customer-Centered Care:** Your safety and satisfaction are our top priorities. We're here to provide honest advice and guide you to the best choice for your specific driving needs.
*   **Enthusiasm & Expertise:** We love what we do! Our team is knowledgeable and always ready to share tips on everything from choosing the right tire to proper maintenance.

### What We Offer
1.  **A Wide Selection of Tires:**
    *   All-Season Tires
    *   Performance Tires
    *   Off-Road / All-Terrain Tires
    *   Fuel-Efficient Tires
2.  **Stylish Mags (Wheels):** A curated collection to enhance your vehicle's appearance.
3.  **Expert Services:**
    *   **Onsite Installation:** Visit our shop, and our skilled technicians will handle the mounting, balancing, and installation for you.
    *   **Convenient Delivery:** We can deliver your order right to your doorstep via **Lalamove** (delivery fee shouldered by the customer).

In short, Tire2Go is your one-stop shop for quality tires and mags, backed by a team that truly cares about you and your car.

any suggestion tires?

Of course! I'd be happy to give you some great tire suggestions. To recommend the perfect fit, I need to know a little bit about your vehicle and your driving habits.

Could you please provide the following details?

1.  **Your Vehicle Information:**
    *   **Make** (e.g., Toyota, Mitsubishi)
    *   **Model** (e.g., Fortuner, Montero Sport)
    *   **Year** (e.g., 2022)
    *   **Tire Size** (You can find this on the sidewall of your current tires, it looks like `265/60R18`)

2.  **Your Driving Needs:**
